short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Present prices history graphs on the relevant product page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool adds price history charts to products on selected online stores. With this feature, users can access price history charts for all products, enabling them to make more informed purchasing decisions.
